data.title: Home
data.text:
Benefits of CSE Membership

CSE helps you to establish contacts and create a personal network of active professionals with similar responsibilities and interests.

CSE provides you opportunities to be involved in developing and delivering education and training activities for editors-in-chief and editorial staff.

CSE keeps you abreast of new standards, issues, and technologies that affect scientific publication.

CSE provides you with opportunities to share your knowledge, experience, ideas, and expertise with fellow CSE members.

Join Today

Announcements

Partner with CSE

Interested in connecting with our members? Check out our sponsorship opportunities!

CSE Scholarship Fund

Donate a tax-free contribution to help enable an early career professional to attend the CSE Annual Meeting and fund their membership for a year.

Visit the CSE Career Center and Job Board

Find your next job, or new hire, today.

Join a CSE Committee

Learn about best practices throughout the industry, and submit a request to add your own resources to the list.

Read CSE's New DEI Scholarly Resources

Learn about best practices throughout the industry, and submit a request to add your own resources to the list.
